import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import Tuscany from '../DB/Tuscany.json'; // import grp from '../assets/home/icons/grp.png'; import drtn from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/duration.svg' import lctn from '../assets/home/icons/location.svg'; import gd from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/guide.svg' import ln from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/language.svg' import fs from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/ticket.svg' // import trnsprt from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/transport.svg' import DatePicker from "../components/DatePicker/DatePicker"; export default function SpecificTour () { const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); return(

{Tuscany.title}

from

Time

Details

Number of group:{Tuscany.people}

*/}
